    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, double price, long isbn, String genre, int year)
      Constructs a new Book object with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      price - The price of the book.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book.
      genre - The genre of the book.
      year - The year the book was published.

      public String toString()

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Book b)
      Compares the current Book instance with another Book instance for equality. Two books are considered equal if they have the same title, author, price, ISBN, genre, and year.
      Parameters:
      b - the other Book instance to be compared with
      Returns:
      true if the two books are equal, false otherwise
